tool_description: Develops detailed content outlines for business documents based on purpose, audience, and key messages to ensure logical flow and comprehensive coverage.

key_points.description: Main points or messages to convey

priority_level.description: Document priority: high, medium, or low

error_messages: Empty key points: Provide at least one key point to include in the outline
Invalid priority level: Use one of [high, medium, low]
Too many sections: Maximum 15 sections allowed for outline creation
Insufficient document sections: Provide at least one section for outline structure
usage: Provide document_purpose, target_audience, key_points, and document_sections to generate a structured outline. Set priority_level for urgency-based organization.

outline_structure.description: Hierarchical outline with main points and sub-points

content_flow.description: Logical progression strategy for the document

estimated_word_count.description: Projected word count based on outline depth
